short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: iBarry, Überprüfung auf Betrug, Phishing, Malware und Fälschungen
short.en: iBarry, check for scams, phishing, malware and fakes
short.es,es_419: iBarry, revisar si hay estafas, phishing, malware y falsificaciones
short.fr: iBarry, recherche des arnaques, des hameçons, des logiciels malveillants et des faux.
short.it: iBarry, controlla truffe, phishing, malware e fake
short.ja: iBarry、詐欺、フィッシング、マルウェア、偽物のチェック
short.nl: iBarry, controleer op oplichting, phishing, malware en nepproducten
short.pl: iBarry, program sprawdzający oszustwa, phishing, złośliwe oprogramowanie i podrobione strony internetowe
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: iBarry, verifica se há fraudes, phishing, malware e falsificações
short.ro: iBarry, verificați dacă există escrocherii, phishing, malware și falsuri
short.ru: iBarry, проверка на мошенничество, фишинг, вредоносное ПО и фейковые программы
short.tr: iBarry, dolandırıcılık, kimlik avı, kötü amaçlı yazılım ve sahteciliği kontrol edin
short.uk: iBarry, перевірте на наявність шахрайських схем, фішингу, шкідливого програмного забезпечення та підробок
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: iBarry，检查诈骗、网络钓鱼、恶意软件和假货

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
iBarry checks for scams, phishing, malware and fakes
Have you received a suspicious link and want to check it for any risks? Download our browser extension and have the website checked.
long.en: The 18th-century Swiss avalanche rescue dog is the inspiration for the name "iBarry." By educating the public about current digital threats and raising awareness, iBarry shields individuals in this century from large-scale immaterial, technical or financial damage.
long.es,es_419,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ro,: Barry is probably the best-known Swiss St Bernard. In his role as an avalanche dog he saved more than 40 human lives at the beginning of the 18th century. Today iBarry protects people from Internet dangers and wants to inform the public of current digital threats, raise awareness and thus protect them from large-scale immaterial, technical or financial damage.
